TestItem.Stem: 7. Which of the sentences below best expresses the meaning of the highlighted sentence in the passage? Incorrect answer choices change the meaning in important ways or leave out essential information.

Distractor_list.Distractor: (A) It is possible that all the salamanders found along the valley are descended from one early species.
(B) Salamander species are typically descended from a common ancestor.
(C) The ancestor of all salamander species found in the valley initially lived at the southern tip of the valley.
(D) Some theories on the emergence of salamander species focus on the existence of an ancestral species.
